title: The Backyard Gang
description: The Backyard Gang - is a thrilling and imaginative children's book that follows the adventures of a diverse group of friends who discover a mysterious chest in their backyard... ...inside the chest, they find a portal to different worlds, where they encounter amazing creatures, exciting challenges, and hidden secrets. Join them as they explore the wonders of the universe, learn valuable lessons, and have tons of fun along the way!
author: Alex C. James
